text: Unhein woh waqt bhi kuch yaad hai jabke humne pahad ko hila kar unpar is tarah chaa diya tha ke goya woh chatri (umbrella/canopy) hai, aur yeh gumaan kar rahey thay ke woh inpar aa padega, aur us waqt humne unsey kaha tha ke jo kitaab hum tumhein de rahey hain isey mazbooti ke saath thaamo (pakdo) aur jo kuch ismein likha hai usey yaad raakho, tawaqqu hai ke tum galat-rawi se bachey rahogey
